jobDescription: Overview  Dow Pharmaceutical Sciences, Inc. is focused on development of topical drug products. A division of Valeant Pharmaceuticals North America, LLC, we are located in Petaluma, California, approximately one hour north of San Francisco. Job Overview: Serves as a primary technical advisor in Analytical Sciences for analysis of pharmaceutical active ingredients, excipients, and topical drug products. Enhances the company’s capability in analytical method development/validation and trains others. Has broad and in-depth understanding of analytical techniques to support testing of a range of small molecules and macromolecules. Has method development/validation experience to accurately assay active ingredients in complex formulation matrices and corresponding expertise to predict and quantitate degradation products Understanding of biomolecules and bioanalytical techniques is desirable. Develops and designs complex analytical experiments, investigative analytical lab plans, and performs insightful reviews of obtained data. Experience in applying ICH guidelines to ANDA and NDA submissions for dermal drug products is a plus. Has good communication skills, is well organized, efficient and adept in identifying key analytical project requirements and deliverables. Monitors the scientific progress, prepares protocols and technical reports.
